mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1955 National Tour: Dial M for Murder by Frederick Knott
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the 1955 Barter National Tour of Frederick Knott's Dial M for Murder. Directed by Howard Hunter. Setting by Lynn Pecktal. Lighting by Albin Aukerlund. Sep 29: Oak Ridge, TN. Oct 1: Big Stone Gap, VA. Oct 3: Pikesville, KY. Oct 4: Fayetteville, WV. Oct 5: White Sulphur Springs, WV. Oct 6: Rocky Mount, VA. Oct 7: Staunton, VA. Oct 8: Waynesboro, VA. Oct 10: Bridgewater , VA. Oct 11: Warrenton, VA. Oct 12: Cumberland, MD. Oct 13: Keyser, WV. Oct 15: St. Mary's City, MD. Oct 17: Bel Air, MD. Oct 19: Orange, VA. Oct 20: Bedford, VA. Oct 21: Richmond, VA. Oct 22: Portsmouth, VA. Oct 24: Franklin, VA. Oct 25: Warwick, VA. Oct 27: Aiken: SC. Oct 29: Raleigh, NC. Oct 31: Narrows, VA. Nov 1: Roanoke, VA. Nov 2: Elon College, NC. Nov 3: Pinehurst, NC. Nov 4: Salisbury, NC. Nov 5: Chatham, VA. Nov 6: Roanoke, VA. Nov 7: Covington, VA. Nov 10: Independence, VA. Nov 11-12: Abingdon, VA.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
